CARNEGIE ENDOWMENT FOR INTERNATIONAL PEACE
RECEIVE
UNITED NATIONS PLAZA
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
AT 46TH STREET
NEW YORK 17, NEW YORK
CABLE ADDRESS INTERFAX
30 December 1958
JAN 2 1959
7|8|9|lpin|12|l|2i8|4!6|9
Dear Mr. Underwood: ^
The Caiurch Peace Union was most gratified
to know of the unanimous decision of your board to distribute the
three program series A TIME TO REMEMBER to your network
stations. We look forward to hearing from you concerning future
developments.
Mr. Robert s. Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
